pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, October 29, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

The Hague, Netherlands

Private meetings

9:05 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver an address to parliamentarians.

Ridderzaal
Binnenhof

Note for media:

  • The event will be streamed live via the following link: https://www.eerstekamer.nl/bijeenkomst/bezoek_premier_van_canada/live

Bergen-Op-Zoom, Netherlands

11:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a wreath-laying ceremony.

Bergen-Op-Zoom Canadian War Cemetery

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

Rotterdam, Netherlands

12:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on climate leadership.

Global Center on Adaptation

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

The Hague, Netherlands

2:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte.

Binnenhof

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint press conference with the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte.                  

Ground Floor Lobby
Binnenhof  

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a question and answer session with university students.

Room 2.02, 2nd floor
Leiden University

Note for media:

  • The event will be streamed live via the following link: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=H9m1-g9fvCQ&feature=emb_title

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a dinner given by the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

8:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Rome, Italy.

Amsterdam Schiphol International Airport

Closed to media

Rome, Italy

10:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Rome, Italy.

Leonardo da Vinci–Fiumicino Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
